entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Power Button
Price: 6.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.

entry.title: iPad 3 & iPad 4 Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 25.99

Your iPad 3 or iPad 4 battery no longer hold a charge or you experience fast battery draining?

Is your battery old? There are high chances that your battery is defective. These signs are saying that it is time to replace your battery because it’s either dead or dying.

 

Buy a Certified, brand-new OEM battery for your iPad 3 and iPad 4.
Our batteries are produced with the same quality standard as original Apple iPad batteries.

This iPad 3 and iPad 4 replacement battery is rated at 11560 mAh (42.5 Wh). 

It will deliver up to 10 hours of battery life exactly when your iPad 3 or iPad 4 was new.

  • Zero cycle count
  • UN38.3, MSDS, ROHS, CE Certification
  • Delivers up to 10 hours of battery life
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • High output current capacity
  • 1-Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is compatible with a 3rd gen iPad or 4th gen iPad.

The iPad 4th generation is the same battery as the 3rd generation iPad.

Warranty

The replacement iPad 3 and iPad 4 battery comes with 1-year warranty.

As with all our other iPad Battery Replacement Parts.

For any assistance with installation or questions with your product please don’t hesitate to contact our support team.

 

Shipping

All items will be shipped from our warehouses in Canada.

All orders placed during business hours will be shipped the same day!

 

Part Type iPad Battery
Compatible Model iPad 3 & iPad 4
Model Number A1416 / A1430 / A1403 / A1458 / A1459 / A1460
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: Screen Digitizer For iPad 3 & 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Digitizer
Price: 26.99

The screen on your 3rd or 4th generation Apple iPad is cracked, scratched or has become non-responsive? This brand new iPad 4 replacement screen is what you need. Purchase this high quality iPad 3 replacement screen with the recommended repair tools and fix your iPad quickly. This digitizer is compatible with a 3rd gen iPad or 4th gen iPad.

For customers who demand the same standard as original repair parts, this OEM iPad replacement part has you covered.

This iPad digitizer includes the home button with flex cable for iPad 4. If you have an iPad 3, you will have to transfer your home button from your old screen.

  • Strong Pre-installed Adhesive
  • Lifetime Warranty

Compatibility 

The iPad 4th generation is the same digitizer as the 3rd generation iPad. 

Lifetime Warranty

This replacement iPad 4 Digitizer comes with lifetime warranty, as our other iPad Digitizer Repair Parts. Your iPad replacement screen will be shipped from Canada the same business day it is purchased. Don't hesitate to contact our support team if you have any questions or concerns.

Part Type iPad Digitizer
Compatible Model iPad 3 & 4
Model Number A1459
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty Lifetime Warranty
